programme.desc: Nada Personal es una serie que trae Discovery Channel para Latinoamérica donde asesinos a sueldo son contratados para matar sin piedad.La serie tipo documental Nada Personal es presentada por Steve Schirippa, conocido por la serie de mafiosos “Los Soprano”. En este programa se verán historias verídicas de asesinatos hechos por contrato.En cada capítulo de la serie, se narra la historia de un trabajo profesional que trata de cómo se contacta, las instrucciones dadas al asesino para llevar a cabo las peticiones del cliente.

programme.title: Venga la alegría
programme.desc: Un programa de entretenimiento matutino que te alegran las mañanas, con la conducción estelar de la pareja Fernando del Solar e Ingrid Coronado, el programa cuenta con secciones tales cómo:- Ingrid habla con los peques- Cocina de Yolo- Baila con Alegría- Los especialistas- Noli y sus tips- El autobús de Danilo- Las rapiditas de Venga la Alegría- La LiliparodiaEl programa empieza con un tema bailable donde los presentadores y sus chicas bailarinas te ayudan a que te animes y llegue la alegría.Durante todo el programa se dan pistas sobre una palabra o frase que el televidente puede concursar para ganarse un premio.

programme.title: True Crime Story

programme.title: The Terror
programme.desc: As the Terminal Islanders adjust to their new surroundings, Chester tries to provide for his family, while fending off the evil that follows him; Henry reels from the trauma of his imprisonment; Asako sees bad omens; Amy takes up a new job.

programme.title: The Terror
programme.desc: Chester, in search of a better life, is treated with hostility by his fellow Americans; Luz hopes to be accepted by Henry and Asako in their new home as the Japanese American community celebrates Obon, a festival to commemorate the dead.

programme.title: The Terror
programme.desc: The Japanese Americans are forced to undertake a humiliating exercise that divides the community; Chester comes face to face with a man who forces him to question his very nature; Luz, stricken by grief, is forced to make an important choice.

programme.title: The Terror
programme.desc: A story of the past provides insight into the present evil that stalks the Terminal Islanders; Chester returns home to his family; Henry and Asako are faced with a difficult decision.

programme.title: The Terror
programme.desc: The Nakayamas have been torn apart; Chester searches for the person he believes can help, by any means necessary; an outbreak in the community forces Amy to act, though she's caught between doing what she's told and doing what's right.

programme.title: The Terror
programme.desc: Chester and Luz have reached a turning point in their relationship; Amy must take matters into her own hands as she's tormented by a powerful nemesis; Chester meets a boy who gives him answers.

programme.title: The Terror
programme.desc: The Terminal Islanders return home to find that things have changed since they left; the Nakayamas, still tense from the pain they've inflicted on one another, must come together to battle the spirit that threatens their future.

programme.title: The Terror
programme.desc: Henry and Asako look to the past to provide answers to their current turmoil; Chester and Luz grapple with their identities in hopes of saving those who are dearest to them; Amy and Yamato-san struggle to once again assimilate into American life.

programme.title: The Terror
programme.sub-title: Infamy: A Sparrow in a Swallow's Nest
programme.desc: In 1941 Chester Nakayama is caught between his insular Japanese American neighborhood on Terminal Island and his current all-American life; extreme circumstances push his community and personal life to the brink, all while someone watches closely.

programme.title: The Terror
programme.sub-title: Infamy: All the Demons Are Still in Hell
programme.desc: After Pearl Harbor, the Terminal Islanders are evicted from their homes and must find shelter elsewhere; while Henry, separated from his family, faces injustice at the hands of the government, Chester engages in a paranoid search for answers.

programme.title: Lakota Nation vs. United States
programme.desc: The Lakota people fight to reclaim their sacred land and protect it from government and corporate interests.

programme.title: Section 8
programme.desc: A good kid in an awful situation and two cops near the bust of their careers cross paths when the kid falls witness to his father's death.

programme.title: Archenemy
programme.desc: A teen meets a mysterious man who claims he lost his superpowers after arriving from another dimension. Together, they take to the streets to wipe out a vicious crime boss and his local drug syndicate.

programme.title: Apex
programme.desc: Imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, ex-cop Thomas Malone gets a chance to win his freedom if he can survive a twisted game. Six goons pay for the thrill of hunting Malone for sport on a remote island, but once he arrives, all hell breaks loose.

programme.title: Muzzle
programme.desc: A Los Angeles police officer and his K-9 partner try to uncover a vast conspiracy that has a chokehold on the city.

programme.title: American Star
programme.desc: An assassin on his last assignment travels to Fuerteventura to kill a man he's never met.

programme.title: Last Looks
programme.desc: An ex-cop comes out of retirement to investigate the mysterious death of drunken actor Alistair Pinch's wife. The case finds him contending with gangsters and Hollywood executives, all in pursuit of clearing Pinch's name -- or confirming his guilt.

programme.title: Clean
programme.desc: An insight into the world of trauma cleaning through the journey of larger-than-life business owner Sandra Pankhurst and the workers at Melbourne's Specialized Cleaning Services.

programme.title: Force of Nature: The Dry 2
programme.desc: Five women head out on a remote hiking retreat but only four return, each telling a different story. Detective Aaron Falk must find out what really happened before time runs out.

programme.title: Sympathy for the Devil
programme.desc: Forced to drive a mysterious passenger at gunpoint, a man finds himself in a high-stakes game of cat and mouse where nothing is as it seems.

programme.title: No Man of God
programme.desc: Sentenced to death by electrocution, serial killer Ted Bundy develops a strange and complicated relationship with FBI agent Bill Hagmaier while detailing his heinous crimes.

programme.title: What Comes Around
programme.desc: A love affair becomes a menacing game of cat and mouse where nothing is what it seems.

programme.title: The Last Breath
programme.desc: A diver's lifelong search for a World War II shipwreck leads to a life-and-death dive, where he and his friends must confront their own limits and fears before time runs out.

programme.title: Piłka nożna: Liga niemiecka - mecz: Borussia Dortmund - Werder Brema
programme.desc: W klubie z Dortmundu doszło ostatnio do trzęsienia ziemi. Po serii porażek Borussii trener Nuri Sahin i jego asystent Łukasz Piszczek stracili pracę. Tymczasowym szkoleniowcem pierwszej drużyny został Mike Tullberg, dotychczas trener zespołu do lat 19. Jego debiut w nowej roli nastąpi w meczu z Werderem, wyprzedzającym BVB w tabeli Bundesligi o jeden punkt. Także zespół z Bremy w 2025 roku nie prezentuje się dobrze. W trzech spotkaniach dwukrotnie przegrał i raz zremisował. Będzie więc tak samo zdeterminowany jak gospodarze, by przerwać złą passę.

programme.desc: W klubie z Dortmundu doszło ostatnio do trzęsienia ziemi. Po serii porażek Borussii trener Nuri Sahin i jego asystent Łukasz Piszczek stracili pracę. Tymczasowym szkoleniowcem pierwszej drużyny został Mike Tullberg, dotychczas trener zespołu do lat 19. Jego debiut w nowej roli nastąpi w meczu z Werderem, wyprzedzającym BVB w tabeli Bundesligi o jeden punkt. Także zespół z Bremy w 2025 roku nie prezentuje się dobrze. W trzech spotkaniach dwukrotnie przegrał i raz zremisował. Będzie więc tak samo zdeterminowany jak gospodarze, by przerwać złą passę.

programme.title: Piłka nożna: Liga niemiecka - mecz: Borussia Dortmund - Werder Brema
programme.desc: W klubie z Dortmundu doszło ostatnio do trzęsienia ziemi. Po serii porażek Borussii trener Nuri Sahin i jego asystent Łukasz Piszczek stracili pracę. Tymczasowym szkoleniowcem pierwszej drużyny został Mike Tullberg, dotychczas trener zespołu do lat 19. Jego debiut w nowej roli nastąpi w meczu z Werderem, wyprzedzającym BVB w tabeli Bundesligi o jeden punkt. Także zespół z Bremy w 2025 roku nie prezentuje się dobrze. W trzech spotkaniach dwukrotnie przegrał i raz zremisował. Będzie więc tak samo zdeterminowany jak gospodarze, by przerwać złą passę.
